title: Awake
lyrics:
Oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh
Sister's got a future,
Mama's got a heartbreak

Girl because of the day I met you

Never felt lonely

When I headed this way

Will I have a bed and go?

Break out away and then we makeup?

We're gonna go wherever it may take us



Awake, here we go-oh oh ooh ooh

Awake, here we go, here we go

(x2)



Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh



Faces on the posters,

Head is in the lampshade

Ever since the day I met you

No one's ever known me

At least not ever this way

Take a step on the winding road

Live in another day âcause we can't stop

Feeling the tidal wave start to shake us



Awake, here we go-oh oh ooh ooh

Awake, here we go, here we go

(x2)



Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh



We all started out now

Didn't know where to go

We never know, we never know

We walk into the path to pave an easy road

I'll get you home, I'll get you home

We're gonna go forever, we're awake



Awake, here we go-oh oh ooh ooh

Awake, here we go, here we go

(x2)



Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh
